about_the_game:
You are a rat. You must climb.
Reach the top, claim the cheese!

In Rat Climber, you only have one goal: reach the top of the world.
You must navigate vertical labyrinths and make daring jumps, but be careful; one false move and you go tumbling down.

There are no stinky collectibles

- Just climb and explore, don't worry about missables or completionist stuff!

There are NO invisible walls, and every object has exact, precise collision

- If there's a small hole or ledge, you can probably walk on it or fit inside. You must think outside the box of traditional platformers and start thinking like a rat to progress up the vertical labyrinth worlds.

There are no power ups or unlockable moves

- There are only 3 controls: Jump, dash, and walk

The dash lets you jump farther and slightly higher


The walk allows for precise movement and prevents you from walking off of ledges



If you fall, there's a chance you could recover progress due to the nature of the world having each zone stacked above the previous one, and the fact that you still have some airborne control, but it's not guaranteed.

Once you are falling for more than a second or two, you lose control and go into ragdoll and are then at the whims of RNGesus where you will land!

Can you guide Ratty to the top of the world and reach cheese heaven? Try your skills in the best 3D ratformer ever made!

The Demo only contains the first zone: Montalcino, the seaside village. Other zones you will get to explore in the full game include dark crystal caves, a cypress swamp, ancient egypt, a victorian manor, a castle in the sky, and others!

Keyboard Controls

Shift: Run
Left Ctrl: Safety Walk (will not walk off of ledges as long as held down)
Spacebar: Jump
Enter/Esc/Backspace: Options Menu

Xbox Controller Controls

B Button: Run
X Button: Safety Walk (will not walk off of ledges as long as held down)
A Button: Jump
Start Button: Options Menu
